Name: Base Station License, Lincoln Limousine Service, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Lincoln Limousine Service Inc., submitted as Lincoln Limo Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Manhattan.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Lincoln Limousine Service Inc., submitted as Lincoln Limo Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 141 Division Street in the borough of Manhattan is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#932
